title: Eerie Silence
story: A profound silence descends upon the castle, broken only by the echo of your own steps. Each sound seems to draw unwanted attention from unseen eyes.
effect: While this card is active, movement through any room (excluding Stairwells) costs 1 additional step. Additionally, if a hero enters a room that already contains a Vampire Sister, that Sister immediately moves 1 step towards that hero.
